section.title: Labeling Commands
section.para:
Add and remove atom labels.
clearlabels commandsclearlabels
Syntax:
clearlabels ( )
Remove all atom labels in the current model.
For example:
clearlabels();
label commandslabel
Syntax:
labeltype ( string ''labeltype'' )
Adds the specified label to each atom in the current selection. Valid labels are listed in ((Label Types)).
For example:
label("element");
adds element labels to the current atom selection.
removelabel commandsremovelabel
Syntax:
removelabel ( string ''labeltype'' )
Remove the specified label (if it exists) from each atom in the current selection.
For example:
removelabel("equivalent");
removes the forcefield equivalent type label from each atom in the current selection.
